name: Act I
description:
*Act I: was printed in London and released in 2009. This is the first time it has been made available to buy online. 

Post and Packaging is FREE anywhere in United Kingdom.

International Post and Packaging is £12.00 tracked. 

Sizing
(measurement in inches)

M.  chest   = 20in  length = 28in  shoulder to shoulder = 18in

L.   chest   = 22in  length = 29in  shoulder to shoulder = 20in

xL. chest   = 24in  length = 30in  shoulder to shoulder = 22in

(please click the 'sizing chart' for a visual guide)


definition of *Act
verb

1.take action; do something:

'Radical Boulevard acts against lies, corruption, injustice and above all tyranny!' 

(act for) take action in order to bring about: one’s ability to act for community change. (Oxford Dictionary)
